name: One Da for Each Tweet RPG
name_original: One Da for Each Tweet RPG
description:
Will you accidentally stumble onto meaning in this nonsense RPG?

Wander from room to room and meet many people, see what they have to say.

Each time you start the game, you will meet a new cast of people.

This whole game fits into two tweets, made for TweetTweetJam 5!

Sprites from Lafolie's TweetTweet Cart Sprite Generator
